title: Diamond Vanki Pendant - A Timeless Classic
materials: 18k Rose Gold with meticulously hand-set Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Each diamond is of VS clarity and GH color
ensuring exceptional sparkle and brilliance. Finished with a smooth Hyderabadi polish for enhanced luster.
features: Inspired by the traditional Vanki design, this pendant features a delicate, wing-like silhouette. The intricate diamond setting showcases a geometric pattern, enhanced with smaller diamonds highlighting the curves. The center features a slightly elevated arrangement of diamonds in a circular halo, adding depth and dimension. It features two loops on either side that easily slides through any chain.
colors: Warm rose gold paired with the dazzling white of the diamonds creates a soft and sophisticated aesthetic.
occasions: and formal gatherings. Can be paired with a simple gold chain or a more elaborate necklace for a traditional look during weddings and festivals (like Sankranthi or Diwali). Suitable as a gift for birthdays
description: This pendant seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds and fine craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. It's a versatile piece that can be dressed up or down, making it a timeless addition to any jewelry collection. Its distinctive Vanki design represents prosperity and good fortune.
